thread.title: Raees Meets Sultan: Check The Trailer Of Salman Khan And Shah Rukh Khan In The Bigg Boss House
thread.title_full: Raees Meets Sultan: Check The Trailer Of Salman Khan And Shah Rukh Khan In The Bigg Boss House

title: Raees Meets Sultan: Check The Trailer Of Salman Khan And Shah Rukh Khan In The Bigg Boss House
text:
facebook 
We told you that King Khan has decided to come back to the Bigg Boss house again, this time to promote Raees . Well, Salman Khan took to social media last night to release the trailer of the two stars who will host the semi-finale of Bigg Boss season 10. 
Dressed in a Pathani suit, you can see Salman Khan aka Sultan welcoming Shah Rukh Khan in the house. Of course, the two manage to make us smile, even in this short 35 seconds trailer. We loved the chemistry, and we cannot wait to watch the whole thing. — Salman Khan (@BeingSalmanKhan) January 8, 2017 
Karan-Arjun aayenge, on January 25th.
